txt_en: A new heart for a New Year.
txt_cn: 新年新心情，旧貌换新颜。

txt_en: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly.
txt_cn: 只有通过内心，我们才能正确地看待一切。

txt_en: May the odds be ever in your favor.
txt_cn: 愿好运永远眷顾你。

txt_en: Life offers up these moments of joy despite everything.
txt_cn: 尽管世事纷繁，生活仍会赐予我们欢乐时刻。

txt_en: Procrastination is the thief of time.
txt_cn: 拖延会盗走时间。

txt_en: There is always something left to love.
txt_cn: 总有一些值得爱的东西。

txt_en: Take nothing on its looks; take everything on evidence.
txt_cn: 不要仅凭外观来判断；要基于证据来下结论。

txt_en: The quality of mercy is not strained.
txt_cn: 慈悲之举，自然流露。

txt_en: What doesn't come from the heart can't bring about real change.
txt_cn: 发自内心的改变才能成真。

txt_en: Have the courage to do what you know is right.
txt_cn: 鼓起勇气去做你认为对的事。

txt_en: My life today is in no way a cold copy of my life yesterday.
txt_cn: 今日的生活绝不是昨天的简单重现。

txt_en: Happiness will dock elsewhere.
txt_cn: 幸福总会在某处停驻。

txt_en: There is more day to dawn.
txt_cn: 来日方长。

txt_en: No need to be anybody but oneself.
txt_cn: 不必成为别人期望的样子，做你自己。

txt_en: Happiness is not a state, but a process.
txt_cn: 幸福并非一种状态，而是一个过程。

txt_en: Let everything happen to you.
txt_cn: 接受一切发生。

txt_en: The future depends on what you do today.
txt_cn: 未来取决于当下的行动。

txt_en: Life is a gift. We must celebrate it.
txt_cn: 生活就是一份赠礼。我们要过好每一天。

txt_en: The trace we trace in the passing of life is more precious than anything else.
txt_cn: 生命中留下的轨迹是最珍贵的东西。

txt_en: I wish I could bottle this moment.
txt_cn: 我想把这美好时刻封存起来。

txt_en: Don't think, just do.
txt_cn: 别瞻前顾后，放手去行动。

txt_en: The Spring Festival is just around the corner.
txt_cn: 春节的脚步近了。

txt_en: I'm not gonna give up. I'm just getting started.
txt_cn: 我不会放弃，一切才刚刚开始。

txt_en: All I want is boundless love.
txt_cn: 我所求的唯有无尽的爱。

txt_en: When you're lost in the darkness, look for the light.
txt_cn: 当你在黑暗中迷失，也要努力去找到有光的路。

txt_en: Sometimes, rock bottom is your trampoline.
txt_cn: 偶尔绝境之处亦是你腾飞的起点。
